channel.title: [Help] How do I use VScrollBars properly in Visual Basic 6.0
channel.description:
I just can't seem to figure out how to use the scrollbars in Visual Basic. I want to make a scrollbar work with a textbox, so how do I do that? :(
Basicaly what I'm asking is, how do I get scrollbars to work? And how do I set there targets? (e.g., a textbox or frame.)
ANY usefull help at all would be appreciated. :)

item.title: [Help] How do I use VScrollBars properly in Visual Basic 6.0
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

Thank you so much! Worked.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] How do I use VScrollBars properly in Visual Basic 6.0
item.dc:creator: @fisser fisser
item.description:
@fisser wrote:

if you make a textbox you have right of the screen thing like ginving it a name ect you have to select multiline and vbschollbar then you have a txt box with scrollbars
